name: No Robot Left Behind
description:
*Important*

Currently there is a visual bug preventing you from getting past a section of the tutorial level. To get around this (since uploads are currently disabled), we recommend you simply drop to the lower platform at the beginning of the level. Thanks!

Join three robots as they navigate the tumultuous far reaches of space. To complete their journey will require teamwork, grit, problem solving, and lots of failure. Good thing their data is backed up!

No Robot Left behind is a stealth like puzzle game where the player will control a team of robots whos goal is to explore the vast regions of space and time and discover the purpose of their existence.

Each robot is designated with a different color and can only manuever through the parts of the map that matches their color. They will have to work together to prevent their destruction.
